Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of the Board's finding on state protection for Romani people in Hungary
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence showing state action against misconduct and willingness to protect victims
Legal_Provision: IRPA - lack of state protection requirement
Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution by right-wing extremists due to Roma identity
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Availability of state protection in Hungary
Proceeding_Type: Refugee status determination, followed by judicial review
Application_Error: Failure to seek state protection without sufficient justification
Application_Factor: Systemic discrimination and police corruption alleged
Decision_Review_Issue: Was the Board's finding on state protection reasonable?
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA provisions on refugee eligibility and state protection
Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible evidence on absence of state protection
Evidentiary_Issues: Claimants' testimony vs. country condition documentation
Credibility_Issues: Allegations not supported by documentary evidence
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimants argued systemic discrimination and lack of effective state protection
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of administrative tribunal decision
Omission_Type: Failure to avail oneself of state protection
